name: Hidden Object Adventures: Sunken Treasures (Full)
description:
Go off the deep-end in this truly immersive Hidden Object game! Submerge yourself in this magic underwater world with a new twist - all the objects are floating while you play! Every level is a new experience each time for maximum replay value. Get your feet wet and dive in for some fun!

----- FEATURES -----

- 12 Levels!
- Hundreds of objects!
- Every level completely randomized!
- Tons of replay value!
- Affordable Price!

13 Languages Supported: English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Dutch, Swedish, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean

Dive in!
